title: Pumpkin stew with sour cream
description: This lentil and pumpkin stew is all about how to make a straightforward recipe a lot more exciting - with very little effort.  Perfect for when it’s cooling down outside and you want something really warming.Each serving provides 273kcal, 8g protein, 28g carbohydrate (of which 14g sugars), 12g fat (of which 7g saturates), 9g fibre and 2g salt.
ingredients: 600g/1lb 5oz assorted pumpkin or squash (total chopped weight)
